response.overview: Budi, a teenager with a violent past, promises his mother not to fight again when he starts a new life at a voca- tional school. However, when injustice reigns and his new friends are threatened, Budi must choose between keeping his promise to his mother or taking part in a dangerous school tournament, and uncover a corruption scandal involving school teachers and dangerous people.
response.tagline: Live action movie based on the popular Indonesian action game TROUBLEMAKER.
response.title: Troublemaker
